    • DAO Slimming Centers

    Previous slideNext slide

    DAO Slimming Centers is considered one of the most successful centers for weight loss all over Egypt. Our journey began 20 years ago with the opending of Haram clinic in 2001. Read More

    The thing that makes Dr. Ahmed's success very unique is that helping people to lose weight and can reach over 70-80kg weight loss with absolutely no Surgery or even Medications, and definitely the concept of weight fixation coming into real life, and so on the success continues to reach 220,000 cases and that was just the start.
    But once he reached 700,000 cases and almost reached million cases he started to train doctors to assist him so he can deliver the help to a wider range of people and also launched new departments.
    So he decided to start the expansion and inaugurated Mohandesin clinic and then Zayed...
    As it was mentioned, departments in each branch was launched, when it was found that the cases are interested in reshaping as well as weight loss we started the "Localized Obesity" department for the reshaping with its own specialized doctors and equipment and the results was astonishing, and the kids, when they were found committed with amazing parents that care enough for their children's health and weight we started our "Childhood Obesity" department from age of 4 years old to 14 with it own doctors and the results was also amazing.
    As people not only from all over Egypt or all over the Middle East but from all over the world try to reach us and travel across the continents just to pay us a visit we decided that we should reach them no matter where they are so we launched the "Online Clinic" to meet them via a video call every week just as the offline clinic...
    Last but not least, we tried to encourage the cases by a competition..
    Our "Golden Transformer Competition", it's a wonderful success for 6 seasons now with more than 11 winners each and everyone lost around 30kg in only 3 months and every winner won as much as he lost Gold! And the series of success is just beginning... Read Less
